Text:
merzedes, in your Bittorrent in the preferences, decrease number of upload slots per torrent. It will be much faster for people to complete downloading and they become seeders.

TNX 4 torrent
upper instruction is useful, because I have 100/100 line, but it is unuseful, because the download is not completed and uTorrent is not seeding very useful.

Thanks Merzedes!

aleksuu, it's true that with decreasing slots some people may get full torrent faster, but there is no guarantee that they will stick around to seed.
